function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Interpreting vague instructions leading to different interpretations of the task","Impact":"Inconsistent contributions and lack of focus on the intended topic","Mitigation":"Provide clear and detailed instructions to contributors","Technologies":"Communication tools like email, messaging apps, or project management platforms","People":"Contributors","Owner":"Project organizers"},{"Description":"Misinterpretation of the task leading to off-topic submissions","Impact":"Decreased relevance of contributions to the intended research topic","Mitigation":"Offer guidance and clarification on the research topic and its relevance to contributions","Technologies":"Video calls, discussion forums, and collaborative document editing tools","People":"Contributors","Owner":"Project organizers"},{"Description":"Risk of COVID-19 being used as a context for contributions without explicit request","Impact":"Inappropriate focus on COVID-19 instead of the intended topic","Mitigation":"Clearly communicate the research focus and provide specific prompts for contributions","Technologies":"Email, project briefs, and research topic guidelines","People":"Contributors","Owner":"Project organizers"}]}
